column2: an A.M. Eatery////This is by far the best breakfast/brunch I've ever had in my 26 years of life. As soon as we stepped foot in the door
column3: we were greeted with light. The atmosphere is fantastic
column4: the food was out of this world. Fresh
column6: every single item had its own flavor. The service was absolutely incredible. Raj was our waitress and she was very informative and even gave us a hot sauce to try out. So awesome! She left a list of recommendations on the back of our ticket to try next time. That was rad. Â I can't say enough good things about Snooze. Good job guys. And to anyone who has wrote a bad review on a long wait? Live a little. Quality takes time.
